snippet.title: Night and Day Video Opening
snippet.description:
Video Opening of Night and Day, a BL Yaoi Visual Novel about art, coming of age, and jazz music. NOW RELEASED!
Original music track by Fricochet and MyëVe.
Video by Kotori Works.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1292440/Night_and_Day/
itchio: https://ertal-games.itch.io/night-and-day
Website: https://www.ertalgames.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/ZUFsg9v
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ertal77
